title: Example of a good bug submission
body:
**[GAMEPLAY] Azir -Dancing Makes Current Soldiers Unable To Attack**

On Azir, when dancing with soldiers spawned, they will emit the piercing effect when they auto attack, however, no damage is dealt and they do not do their stabbing animation. However, these soldiers will turn where you want them to attack, just do no damage.

1. Summon soldiers
2. Dance (Control+3)
3. Attempt to attack minion/champion near the soldier.
Just don't dance with a soldier out, and you won't be affected.
 
I've tried this over 3 games and this has happened each time, this has happened on both skins. Items do not affect this bug. 
 
[Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PPtosuF21-Q&feature=youtu.be)


This report does a lot of things correctly:

* The title is properly tagged as [GAMEPLAY]
* The title is descriptive and to the point
* There is a broader explanation of what the issue is
* This mentions that it happens 100% of the time following these steps
* There is a video that demonstrates this issue occurring (not necessary, but extremely helpful!)

Pink ward occasionally  not showing wards in bushes

This is a line of site issue. Where terrain extends into a bush even if by a small amount, and that terrain blocks direct line of site of a pink ward of seeing a green ward or yellow ward. An example would be curved bush adjacent to curved terrain with a pink placed at one end of a curve and the green placed at the other with the central part of the terrain preventing a straight line existing between the two that doesn't intersect the terrain. The new map was supposed to fix several instances where issues occurred due to terrain design; but I've noticed myself that some of those types of issues persist into the new map.
